Header: Common Candidates plans for Education a jumble; Min. Bandula
Content: Education Minister Bandula Gunawardana says that the proposals for education given in the common candidate Maithreepala Sirisenaâ€™s election manifesto have been made with the consultation of former President Chandrika Bandaranaike Kumaratunga, Opposition Leader Ranil Wickremesinghe and Northern Provincial Chief Minister. The minister expressed these views during a UPFA media briefing held in Colombo today.
